name: FREEDMAN
description:
...A BARE MATTRESS...

...A DOOR THAT LEADS NOWHERE...

...STAINS ON THE CARPET...

...WATER IN THE SKY...

...BECOME YOUR TRUE SELPH AND...

...LIVE ANOTHER DAY


Freedman is a 3D dream exploration game focused on personal player discovery.

Catch cicada, learn about new worlds, talk to NPCs, and enjoy the sights and sounds.

More areas open up as you explore and find secrets.

Current release date is TBD, however I'm aiming for mid 2024, I'm just one person though so please be patient!!

  • 50+ interconnected 3D dream worlds, filled to the brim with secrets.
  • Worlds change depending on your characters mental state and a per-dream seed.
  • Plenty of original 3D modelled NPCs.
  • Thousands of digitally hand painted textures.
  • Tons of original atmospheric music.
  • Inspired by that other game you like.

If you want to be up to date on development or ask any questions you can visit this discord.

Discord server Made using GZDOOM, Slade, UDB, Krita, and Sunvox
